first_steps.name: LIFT YOUR HEAD
first_steps.message: You are a wonderful creature! The first step is always the most important.

move_now.name: MOVE NOW!
move_now.message: Action creates momentum. Keep moving forward, don't stop!

break_silence.name: BREAK THE SILENCE
break_silence.message: Your voice matters. Express yourself, make yourself heard. The world awaits you!

persevere.name: PERSEVERE
persevere.message: Perseverance beats talent. Keep going, you're on the right path!

release.name: RELEASE
release.message: Free yourself from your chains. Let go of what holds you back.

stand_up.name: STAND UP!
stand_up.message: Get up! You are a warrior, a champion. Don't stay down!

jesus_loves.name: YOU ARE LOVED
jesus_loves.message: Jesus loves you as you are. His love is unconditional and eternal.

halfway.name: HALFWAY THERE
halfway.message: You've come halfway! Keep going, the best is yet to come!

combo_master.name: COMBO MASTER
combo_master.message: Extraordinary combo! You've mastered the art of connection!

warrior.name: WARRIOR OF LIGHT
warrior.message: You are a warrior! Your courage inspires the world around you.

unstoppable.name: UNSTOPPABLE
unstoppable.message: Nothing can stop you! You are a force of nature!

master.name: ABSOLUTE MASTER
master.message: You've reached supreme mastery! You are extraordinary!

ultimate_trophy.name: ULTIMATE TROPHY
ultimate_trophy.message: MAXIMUM level reached! You are an absolute champion! Discover Emmanuel's inclusive universe.

messages.15: Level 15! A quarter of the way!
messages.50: Level 50! MAXIMUM reached! You are a MASTER!
